basic_information.scholarship_name: Black and Randolph Families Scholarship in Education
basic_information.committee_name: CEPS - Black and Randolph Families Scholarship in
basic_information.college_name: College of Education and Professional Studies

description: To provide scholarship assistance to any student pursuing a degree in education with the intent to teach. Eligibility Requirements Minimum 3.0 GPA Must have completed 62 hours of credit Must be enrolled in minimum of 12 hours for each semester award received Must have completed FAFSA and be Pell Grant eligible Selection Process Recipients of the scholarship will be selected by a departmental committee Award Requirements Must be enrolled in the upcoming fall and spring semester to receive award Attendance at an awards banquet is required for all recipients Recipients must write a thank you letter to the donors of the scholarship

general_criteria.description: Soft requirements that provide additional points/consideration

hard_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship
